dmca.title: [ABUSE] Misuse of FIFA Intellectual property -- Urgent Action
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of The Planet
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2006 2:46 PM
To: Copyright; fifaworldcupmonitoring@sportsmarketingsurveys.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Misuse of FIFA Intellectual property -- Urgent Action Required]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Misuse of FIFA Intellectual property -- Urgent Action
Required
Date:         Sun, 4 Jun 2006 12:39:20 +0100
From:         <fifaworldcupmonitoring@sportsmarketingsurveys.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         rpp@fifa.org



/Deutsche Fassung siehe weiter unten./
///El texto en espa
